parameters.name: reporting_feeds
parameters.label: Reporting Feeds:
parameters.query:
ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| extend ReportingFeeds=parse_json(Description)['ReportingFeeds']
| where isnotnull(ReportingFeeds)
| mv-expand ReportingFeeds
| summarize by tostring(ReportingFeeds)
| order by ReportingFeeds asc

content.query:
let data=ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| extend Enrichment=parse_json(Description)
| extend ReportingFeed=Enrichment['ReportingFeeds'][0], IocSeverity=tostring(Enrichment['Severity']), Value=tostring(Enrichment['IOC'])
| where ReportingFeed in ({reporting_feeds});
data
| summarize Count=dcount(Value) by IocSeverity
| extend IocSeverities=IocSeverity
| union (
 data 
 | summarize Count=dcount(Value) 
 | extend IocSeverity='All', IocSeverities='*' 
)
| extend Severity = iif(IocSeverity == "All", 0,iif(IocSeverity == "High", 1, iif(IocSeverity == "Medium", 2, iif(IocSeverity == "Low", 3, 4))))
| order by Severity asc
content.title: Total Indicators by Severity

content.query:
ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| extend Enrichment=parse_json(Description)
| extend ReportingFeed = Enrichment['ReportingFeeds'][0], Value = tostring(Enrichment['IOC'])
| where ReportingFeed in ({reporting_feeds})
| where Enrichment['Severity'] == '{IndicatorSeverityPicker}' or '{IndicatorSeverityPicker}' == 'All'
| extend IndicatorType = iif(isnotempty(EmailSourceIpAddress) or isnotempty(NetworkDestinationIP) or isnotempty(NetworkIP) or isnotempty(NetworkSourceIP) or isnotempty(NetworkCidrBlock), "IP",
                        iff(isnotempty(Url), "URL",
                        iff(isnotempty(EmailRecipient) or isnotempty(EmailSenderAddress), "Email",
                        iff(isnotempty(FileHashValue), "File",
                         iff(isnotempty(DomainName) or isnotempty(EmailSourceDomain), "Domain",
                        "Other")))))
| summarize CountOfIndicators=dcount(Value) by IndicatorType
content.title: Total Indicators by Type

content.query:
ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| extend Enrichment=parse_json(Description)
| extend ReportingFeed = Enrichment['ReportingFeeds'][0]
| where ReportingFeed in ({reporting_feeds})
| where Enrichment['Severity'] == '{IndicatorSeverityPicker}' or '{IndicatorSeverityPicker}' == 'All'
| extend IndicatorType = iif(isnotempty(EmailSourceIpAddress) or isnotempty(NetworkDestinationIP) or isnotempty(NetworkIP) or isnotempty(NetworkSourceIP) or isnotempty(NetworkCidrBlock), "IP",
                        iff(isnotempty(Url), "URL",
                        iff(isnotempty(EmailRecipient) or isnotempty(EmailSenderAddress), "Email",
                        iff(isnotempty(FileHashValue), "File",
                         iff(isnotempty(DomainName) or isnotempty(EmailSourceDomain), "Domain",
                        "Other")))))
| project Value=tostring(Enrichment['IOC']), Type=IndicatorType, tostring(ReportingFeed), Severity=tostring(Enrichment['Severity']), FirstSeen=tostring(Enrichment['FirstSeen']),
         LastSeen=tostring(Enrichment['LastSeen']), RelatedAlert=tostring(Enrichment['RelatedAlert'])
| summarize make_set(Value) by Value, Type, ReportingFeed, Severity, FirstSeen, LastSeen, RelatedAlert
| order by LastSeen desc

let tiObservables = ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| extend Enrichment=parse_json(Description)
| extend ReportingFeed = Enrichment['ReportingFeeds'][0], IocSeverity=tostring(Enrichment['Severity'])
| where ReportingFeed in ({reporting_feeds})
| project observableValue = strcat(NetworkSourceIP, NetworkIP, NetworkDestinationIP, Url, EmailSourceIpAddress, EmailSenderAddress, DomainName), IocSeverity;
let alertEntity = SecurityAlert 
| project parse_json(Entities), SystemAlertId
| mvexpand(Entities)
| extend entity = iif(isnotempty(Entities.Address), Entities.Address,
                  iif(isnotempty(Entities.HostName),strcat(Entities.HostName, ".", Entities.DnsDomain),
                  iif(isnotempty(Entities.Url), Entities.Url,
                  iif(Entities.Type == "account", strcat(Entities.Name,"@",Entities.UPNSuffix),"")))) 
| where isnotempty(entity) 
| project entity, SystemAlertId;
alertEntity
| join kind= inner tiObservables on $left.entity == $right.observableValue
| summarize Count=dcount(observableValue) by IocSeverity
| extend IocSeverities=IocSeverity
| union (
 alertEntity
 | join kind= inner tiObservables on $left.entity == $right.observableValue
 | summarize Count=dcount(observableValue)
 | extend IocSeverity='All', IocSeverities='*' 
)
| extend Severity = iif(IocSeverity == "All", 0,iif(IocSeverity == "High", 1, iif(IocSeverity == "Medium", 2, iif(IocSeverity == "Low", 3, 4))))
| order by Severity asc
content.title: Total Matched Indicators by Severity

content.query:
let tiObservables = ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| extend Enrichment=parse_json(Description)
| extend ReportingFeed = Enrichment['ReportingFeeds'][0]
| where ReportingFeed in ({reporting_feeds})
| where Enrichment['Severity'] == '{IndicatorSeverityPicker}' or '{IndicatorSeverityPicker}' == 'All'
| extend IndicatorType = iif(isnotempty(EmailSourceIpAddress) or isnotempty(NetworkDestinationIP) or isnotempty(NetworkIP) or isnotempty(NetworkSourceIP) or isnotempty(NetworkCidrBlock), "IP",
                        iff(isnotempty(Url), "URL",
                        iff(isnotempty(EmailRecipient) or isnotempty(EmailSenderAddress), "Email",
                        iff(isnotempty(FileHashValue), "File",
                        iff(isnotempty(DomainName) or isnotempty(EmailSourceDomain), "Domain",
                        "Other")))))
| project observableValue = strcat(NetworkSourceIP, NetworkIP, NetworkDestinationIP, Url, EmailSourceIpAddress, EmailSenderAddress, DomainName), IndicatorType;
let alertEntity = SecurityAlert 
| project parse_json(Entities), SystemAlertId
| mvexpand(Entities)
| extend entity = iif(isnotempty(Entities.Address), Entities.Address,
                  iif(isnotempty(Entities.HostName),strcat(Entities.HostName, ".", Entities.DnsDomain),
                  iif(isnotempty(Entities.Url), Entities.Url,
                  iif(Entities.Type == "account", strcat(Entities.Name,"@",Entities.UPNSuffix),"")))) 
| where isnotempty(entity) 
| project entity, SystemAlertId;
alertEntity
| join kind= inner tiObservables on $left.entity == $right.observableValue
| summarize CountOfIndicators=dcount(observableValue) by IndicatorType
content.title: Total Matched Indicators by Type

content.query:
let tiObservables = ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| extend Enrichment=parse_json(Description)
| extend ReportingFeed = Enrichment['ReportingFeeds'][0]
| where ReportingFeed in ({reporting_feeds})
| where Enrichment['Severity'] == '{IndicatorSeverityPicker}' or '{IndicatorSeverityPicker}' == 'All'
| extend Tags=set_union(Enrichment['UserTags'],Enrichment['SystemTags'])
| mvexpand Tags
| where isnotnull(Tags)
| project observableValue = strcat(NetworkSourceIP, NetworkIP, NetworkDestinationIP, Url, EmailSourceIpAddress, EmailSenderAddress, DomainName), Tags;
let alertEntity = SecurityAlert 
| project parse_json(Entities), SystemAlertId
| mvexpand(Entities)
| extend entity = iif(isnotempty(Entities.Address), Entities.Address,
                  iif(isnotempty(Entities.HostName),strcat(Entities.HostName, ".", Entities.DnsDomain),
                  iif(isnotempty(Entities.Url), Entities.Url,
                  iif(Entities.Type == "account", strcat(Entities.Name,"@",Entities.UPNSuffix),"")))) 
| where isnotempty(entity) 
| project entity, SystemAlertId;
alertEntity
| join kind= inner tiObservables on $left.entity == $right.observableValue
| summarize Count=dcount(observableValue) by Tag=tostring(Tags)
| order by Count desc
content.title: Top Tags Linked with Matched Indicators

content.query:
let tiObservables = ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| extend Enrichment = parse_json(Description)
| extend ReportingFeed = Enrichment['ReportingFeeds'][0]
| where ReportingFeed in ({reporting_feeds})
| where Enrichment['Severity'] == '{IndicatorSeverityPicker}' or '{IndicatorSeverityPicker}' == 'All'
| extend Malwares= Enrichment['Malwares']
| where isnotnull(Malwares)
| mvexpand Malwares
| project observableValue = strcat(NetworkSourceIP, NetworkIP, NetworkDestinationIP, Url, EmailSourceIpAddress, EmailSenderAddress, DomainName), Malwares;
let alertEntity = SecurityAlert 
| project parse_json(Entities), SystemAlertId
| mvexpand(Entities)
| extend entity = iif(isnotempty(Entities.Address), Entities.Address,
                  iif(isnotempty(Entities.HostName),strcat(Entities.HostName, ".", Entities.DnsDomain),
                  iif(isnotempty(Entities.Url), Entities.Url,
                  iif(Entities.Type == "account", strcat(Entities.Name,"@",Entities.UPNSuffix),"")))) 
| where isnotempty(entity) 
| project entity, SystemAlertId;
alertEntity
| join kind= inner tiObservables on $left.entity == $right.observableValue
| summarize Count=dcount(observableValue) by Malware=tostring(Malwares)
| order by Count desc
content.title: Top Malwares Linked with Matched Indicators

content.query:
let tiObservables = ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| extend Enrichment = parse_json(Description)
| extend ReportingFeed = Enrichment['ReportingFeeds'][0]
| where ReportingFeed in ({reporting_feeds})
| where Enrichment['Severity'] == '{IndicatorSeverityPicker}' or '{IndicatorSeverityPicker}' == 'All'
| extend ThreatActors=Enrichment['ThreatActors']
| where isnotnull(ThreatActors)
| mvexpand ThreatActors
| project observableValue = strcat(NetworkSourceIP, NetworkIP, NetworkDestinationIP, Url, EmailSourceIpAddress, EmailSenderAddress, DomainName), ThreatActors;
let alertEntity = SecurityAlert 
| project parse_json(Entities), SystemAlertId
| mvexpand(Entities)
| extend entity = iif(isnotempty(Entities.Address), Entities.Address,
                  iif(isnotempty(Entities.HostName),strcat(Entities.HostName, ".", Entities.DnsDomain),
                  iif(isnotempty(Entities.Url), Entities.Url,
                  iif(Entities.Type == "account", strcat(Entities.Name,"@",Entities.UPNSuffix),"")))) 
| where isnotempty(entity) 
| project entity, SystemAlertId;
alertEntity
| join kind= inner tiObservables on $left.entity == $right.observableValue
| summarize Count=dcount(observableValue) by ThreatActor=tostring(ThreatActors)
| order by Count desc
content.title: Top Threat Actors Linked with Matched Indicators

content.query:
let tiObservables=ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| extend Enrichment=parse_json(Description)
| extend ReportingFeed=Enrichment['ReportingFeeds'][0]
| where ReportingFeed in ({reporting_feeds})
| where Enrichment['Severity'] == '{IndicatorSeverityPicker}' or '{IndicatorSeverityPicker}' == 'All'
| project Enrichment, observableValue = strcat(NetworkSourceIP, NetworkIP, NetworkDestinationIP, Url, EmailSourceIpAddress, EmailSenderAddress, DomainName), SourceSystem;
let alertEntity = SecurityAlert 
| project parse_json(Entities), SystemAlertId, AlertName
| mvexpand(Entities)
| extend entity=iif(isnotempty(Entities.Address), Entities.Address,
                iif(isnotempty(Entities.HostName),strcat(Entities.HostName, ".", Entities.DnsDomain),
                iif(isnotempty(Entities.Url), Entities.Url,
                iif(Entities.Type == "account", strcat(Entities.Name,"@",Entities.UPNSuffix),"")))) 
| where isnotempty(entity) 
| project entity, SystemAlertId, AlertName;
alertEntity
| join kind= inner tiObservables on $left.entity == $right.observableValue
| extend Severity=tostring(Enrichment['Severity']), Tags=tostring(set_union(Enrichment['UserTags'],Enrichment['SystemTags'])), ThreatActors=tostring(Enrichment['ThreatActors']), Malwares=tostring(Enrichment['Malwares'])
| summarize Alerts = dcount(SystemAlertId) by Value=observableValue, Severity, SourceSystem, AlertName
| order by Alerts desc
